title: Business Risk Intelligence BRI
extract: Effective decision-making with business risk intelligence. ... Organisations looking to not only detect cyber threats but also mitigate enterprise-wide risk are embracing a more strategic and comprehensive type of intelligence: Business Risk Intelligence (BRI).Aug 28, 2018
extract_html: Effective decision-making with business risk intelligence. ... Organisations looking to not only detect cyber threats but also mitigate enterprise-wide risk are embracing a more strategic and comprehensive type of intelligence: Business Risk Intelligence (BRI).Aug 28, 2018
